entry.para: Left L FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO
Center C FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO
Right R FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO

numlitem.para: EICAS status message A/P SINGLE SYS may remain displayed.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/P Engage Switches (L CMD, C CMD, R CMD) One Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated autopilot system is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional Deferral Required – AUTOPILOT SYSTEM.

numlitem.para: If Autopilot engagement between 250 feet and 500 feet AGL is desired: the pilot will not engage the autopilot unless the Auto Flight Director System being used is fully operational.
Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.

placard.para: Placard A/P Engage Switches "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: MODE CONTROL PANEL SWITCHES A/P ENGAGE SWITCHES ONE INOPERATIVE

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Open and collar the FCC servo circuit breaker (P7 panel) for the inoperative FCC:

entry.para: Left L FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO
Center C FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO
Right R FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO

numlitem.para: Before each departure, verify that status message A/P SINGLE SYS is not displayed. If A/P SINGLE SYS is displayed see MEL 22-10-1-3 for dispatch.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/T Arm Switch (A/T ARM)

remarks.para: May be inoperative ON provided autothrottle disconnect switches are operative.

placard.para: Placard A/T ARM Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/T Arm Switch (A/T ARM)

remarks.para: May be inoperative OFF provided autothrottle systems are considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional Deferral Required – AUTOTHROTTLE SYSTEMS

numlitem.para: If A/T ARM Switch is in the OFF position, the EEC engine trim function will not operate. Small thrust asymmetry may occur even if the throttles appear aligned.
EICAS display of Thrust Management computations are operative.
Set thrust manually.

placard.para: Placard A/T ARM Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/T Speed Mode Engage Switch (SPD)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require autothrottle use.

note.para: Autothrottle Speed mode cannot be manually selected.
A/T Speed mode is the default A/T mode after altitude capture on FLCH, VNAV, or G/A.
VNAV commands the A/T to speed determined by FMC.

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.

placard.para: Placard A/T SPD Mode Engage Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – Flight Director Switches (F/D) Both Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative OFF provided flight director displays are considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional Deferral Required – FLIGHT DIRECTOR DISPLAYS.

placard.para: Placard F/D Switch(es) “INOP” and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – Flight Director Switches (F/D) F/O’s Operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative OFF provided flight director displays are considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional Deferral Required – FLIGHT DIRECTOR DISPLAYS.

placard.para: Placard F/D Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – IAS/MACH SEL (Reference) Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided IAS is displayed in associated window.

placard.para: Placard IAS/MACH SEL Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: MODE CONTROL PANEL SWITCHES (REFERENCE) SWITCH
maintenance.para: For dispatch with an inoperative IAS/MACH SEL Switch, IAS must be displayed in the associated MCP window. If MACH is displayed, simultaneously cycling P7 panel MCP L and MCP R circuit breakers will cause IAS to be displayed in the window.

item.title: MODE CONTROL PANEL SWITCHES – APP SWITCH

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require use of autopilot or flight director.

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 1.
Two operative Flight Directors required to fly charted ILS CAT 1 minimums below RVR 4000 or 3/4 mile visibility.

placard.para: Placard APP Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – LOC Engage Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided localizer only approach is not used.

note.para: LOC selection is not available. LNAV, HDG SEL, APP, or manual flight may be used.

numlitem.para: Localizer only approaches prohibited.

placard.para: Placard LOC Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – THR Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

numlitem.para: Use the FMS-CDU entries to change the thrust limit.

placard.para: Placard THR Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – L NAV Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

numlitem.para: Use HDG SEL to follow the desired course. LNAV limits bank angle to comply with maneuvering limitations; HDG SEL does not. When operating at MAX altitude using a roll mode other than LNAV, fly at least 10 kts. above minimum maneuver amber speed band and limit bank angle to 10 degrees.
HDG SEL and HDG HOLD must be operative.
GPS, RNAV (GPS), and LOC BC approaches are prohibited.
RNP operations prohibited.

placard.para: Placard L NAV Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – HDG HOLD Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

note.para: HDG SEL must be operative.

placard.para: Placard HDG HOLD Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – V NAV

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

note.para: For RVSM en route operations, any one of the following autopilot modes will provide acceptable altitude hold capability:

numlitem.para: Altitude Hold (ALT HOLD).
Vertical Speed (V/S) with 0000 selected.

note.para: Use operative vertical modes to follow desired flight path. FLCH and V/S must be operative.

numlitem.para: VNAV approaches are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard V NAV Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – ALT HOLD

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

numlitem.para: For RVSM en route operations, any one of the following autopilot modes will provide acceptable altitude hold capability:
Vertical Speed (V/S) with 0000 selected.
Vertical Navigation (VNAV) with FMC flight plan.
VNAV with FMC flight plan with altitude intervention.
Use operative vertical modes to follow desired flight path.
Use V/S for unplanned level off.
Use V/S for level off at MDA.

placard.para: Placard ALT HOLD Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

numlitem.para: For RVSM en route operations, any one of the following autopilot modes will provide acceptable altitude hold capability:
Altitude Hold (ALT HOLD).
Vertical Speed (V/S) with 0000 selected.
Vertical Navigation (VNAV) with FMC flight plan.
VNAV with FMC Flight plan with altitude intervention.
Use operative vertical modes to follow desired flight path. VNAV and V/S must be operative.

placard.para: Placard FLCH Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

numlitem.para: For RVSM en route operations, any one of the following autopilot modes will provide acceptable altitude hold capability:
Altitude Hold (ALT HOLD).
Vertical Navigation (VNAV) with FMC flight plan.
VNAV with FMC flight plan with altitude intervention.
Use operative vertical modes to follow desired flight path.
Normal AFDS operation procedures do not require V/S. VNAV and FLCH must be operative.

placard.para: Placard V/S Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switch Lights – Autopilot Engage Switch Lights (CMD)

remarks.para: May be inoperative.

numlitem.para: Verify autopilot engagement using PFD flight mode annunciations.

placard.para: Placard Autopilot Engage switch light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: Mode Control Panel Switch Lights – Mode Selector Switch Lights

remarks.para: May be inoperative.

numlitem.para: Verify autopilot mode engagement using PFD flight mode annunciations.

placard.para: Placard Mode Selector switch(es) light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require its use.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
NO AUTOLAND

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 1.

placard.para: Placard Autoland "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

item.title: Automatic Landing System (Autoland) – Triple Channel Autoland – (LAND 3)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require its use.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
NO LAND 3

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.

placard.para: Placard Autoland "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

item.title: Automatic Landing System (Autoland) – Automatic Rollout Control

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require its use.

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 3a.

placard.para: Placard Automatic Rollout Control "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Operation of remaining yaw damper is verified to be operative, and
Associated yaw damper switch remains OFF.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
YAW DAMP ___

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 3a.

placard.para: Placard affected Yaw Damper Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Verify the proper operation of the remaining yaw damper by performing the following:

numlitem.para: Establish electrical power per (AMM 24-22-00/201) and hydraulic power per (AMM 29-11-00/201).
Verify that the IRUs are aligned and in NAV mode.
Perform CMC YDM ACT ground test for the operational yaw damper using AMM (22-21-00).
Restore aircraft to required configuration.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

remarks.para: May be inoperative.

placard.para: Placard affected Yaw Damper light(s) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require its use.

note.para: North Polar Route Restrictions.

numlitem.para: If A/T ARM Switch is in the OFF position, the EEC engine trim function will not operate. Small thrust asymmetry may occur even if the throttles appear aligned.
EICAS display of Thrust Management Computers computations are operative.
Set thrust manually.
Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.
North Polar Routes prohibited.

placard.para: Placard A/T ARM switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided AUTOTHROTTLE ARM switch is operative.

placard.para: Placard near A/T Control switch "L (R) A/T DISC SW INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Autothrottles are not armed, and
Approach minimums do not require use of autothrottles.

note.para: North Polar Route Restrictions.

numlitem.para: If A/T ARM Switch is in the OFF position, the EEC engine trim function will not operate. Small thrust asymmetry may occur even if the throttles appear aligned.
#2 EICAS display of Thrust Management computations are operative.
Set thrust manually.
Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.
North Polar Routes prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near A/T Control switch "L (R) A/T DISC SW INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Set Autothrottle Arm Switch to OFF.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: No autopilot is used below 1,500 feet AGL, and
Approach minimums do not require autopilot use.
Do not use Autopilot below 1,500 feet AGL.
Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 1.
Two operative Flight Directors required to fly charted ILS CAT 1 minimums below RVR 4000 or 3/4 mile visibility.
PRM approaches prohibited.

placard.para: Placard TO/GA switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Thrust levers are operated manually for takeoff and go-around, and
Autopilot and Flight Director are not used below 500 feet AGL or MDA whichever is higher.

note.para: Flight Director go-around and Windshear guidance are not available with both TO/GA switches inoperative.

numlitem.para: Do not use Autopilot below 1,500 feet AGL.
Do not use Autopilot or Flight Director below 500 feet AGL or MDA whichever is higher.
Review/brief Windshear Avoidance, Precautions, Recognition and Recovery procedures in AOM Chapter 2.0.
Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 1.
Takeoffs and Landings in known or forecasted windshear conditions are prohibited.
PRM approaches prohibited.

placard.para: Placard TO/GA switch(es) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

item.chgdesc: Adds FANS Limitation.
item.title: High Frequency (HF) Communication System – Both Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require its use.

note.para: North Polar Route Restrictions.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
HF DATA ___

numlitem.para: For International Operations, the Captain will contact Flight Control to determine ATC and company VHF/HF/SATCOM communication requirements.
The Dispatcher and Captain will refer to OPS Spec B45/B50.
Reference FOM Communications chapter for additional information.
Communications must be maintained with ATC and company.
Operations in RNP-4 airspace are prohibited.

para.revision: FANS Operations prohibited.

numlitem.para: North Polar Routes prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near HF Control Panel "Both HF INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

item.title: High Frequency (HF) Communication System – One Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative while conducting operations that require two LRCS provided:

numlitem.para: SATCOM voice or data link is operative,
Alternate procedures are established and used,
SATCOM coverage is available over the intended route of flight, and
If Inmarsat codes are not available while using SATCOM voice, prior coordination with the appropriate ATS facilities is required.

note.para: SATCOM is to be used only as a backup to normal HF communications unless otherwise authorized by the appropriate ATS facilities.
North Polar Route Restrictions.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
HF DATA ___

numlitem.para: For International Operations, the Captain will contact Flight Control to determine ATC and company VHF/HF/SATCOM communication requirements.
The Dispatcher and Captain will refer to OPS Spec B50.
Reference FOM Communications chapter for additional information.
One may be inoperative provided SATCOM Data Link is operative and SATCOM coverage is available over the intended route of flight.
North Polar Routes prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near HF Control Panel "L (R) HF INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

remarks.para: Any in excess of those required by FAR may be inoperative provided it is not powered by the Emergency DC Bus, Battery Bus, Battery Direct Bus or the Transfer Bus and not required for emergency procedures.

note.para: The left (Captain’s) VHF radio must be operative.
ACARS operative with HF and/or SATCOM operative.

placard.para: Placard near Captains Audio Select Panel "R VHF (C VHF and ACARS) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

remarks.para: Center or right panel may be inoperative provided associated switch remains OFF.

remarks.para: Center or right panel may be inoperative provided associated switch remains OFF.

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require its use.
